{"step_by_step_thinking": "The mandibular third molar, also known as the wisdom tooth, is located in the lower jaw. If the distal root is missing during extraction, it is likely that it has been displaced into a nearby space. The submandibular space is the closest anatomical space to the mandibular third molar, making it the most likely location for the displaced root tip.", "answer_choice": "B. Submandibular space"}
